drupalNodeEvent.title: Rising Global Tensions and China’s Climate Fight

field_speakers.processed:
Denise Van der Kamp (Oxford University)

Deborah Seligsohn (Villanova University)

Kai Wegrich (Hertie School)

Genia Kostka (Freie Universität Berlin)

field_description.processed:
Please join our next Berlin Contemporary China Network (BCCN) roundtable to discuss China‘s climate fight in the context of rising global tensions. Roundtable participants will be Denise Van der Kamp (Oxford University), Deborah Seligsohn (Villanova University), Kai Wegrich (Hertie School) and Genia Kostka (Freie Universität Berlin).

Register here: https://fu-berlin.webex.com/weblink/register/r5cad54aaed01bb45b444bcbcc4c9fbd1
